data.title: The DCH Foundation
data.meta_description: The DCH Foundation continues to work closely with the DCH Health System to address health care challenges in our community. Visit our site to learn more.
data.text:
donate

Address:

1110 Dr. Edward Hillard Drive

Tuscaloosa, AL 35401

Phone: 205-759-7349

When a community comes together in philanthropy, we create a positive force that offers the greatest hope for a better healthcare future for every person, every family – EVERY DAY.

Our community is strong and vibrant, and together we will carry on our efforts to help our patients in need. The DCH Foundation continues to work closely with the DCH Health System to address health care challenges through our Joint Board Task Force, comprised of leaders from the Foundation and Health System boards. Their love for this community and desire for our health system’s excellence ensures your generosity will have the greatest possible impact on the patients we treat – whether they are your friends, family, or neighbors you just haven’t met yet.

Take a look at some of the numbers:
